name: @nativescript/ui-charts
description: Nativescript wrapper for Highcharts iOS and Android SDKs

scripts.build: npm run tsc  && npm run build.angular && mv "$(npm pack | tail -n 1)" nativescript-ui-charts.tgz
scripts.demo.ios: tsc && npm i && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm i && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm i && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --no-hmr
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm i && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --no-hmr
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove @nativescript/ui-charts && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove @nativescript/ui-charts && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npm run demo-angular.reset && npx rimraf node_modules package-lock.json angular && npm run tsc
